Before completing my mail-in ballot (standard in my state) I spent some time looking at various political forums, published comments to political commentators and polls. My impression was that the general mood of the voting population, other than obvious administration supporters such as evangelicals and party-line dummies, favors throw the bums (Republicans) out. 
 
 I was surprised at how many admitted Republicans are sick of Iraq, sick of fiscal irresponsibility, sick of the Bush Administration and sick of congressional rubber stamps for administration. When I compare those random opinions to those on this forum, I couldn't help but wonder who other than the obvious (EZ, Jim's Trucking and the evangelists) actually support current administration and congress.
